about.1: Enyo was established in the summer of 2020. Built on the foundations of our love and passion for Esports and the Esports community. Our aim is to provide the esports community with high end esports performance wear and merchandise; without compromising on comfort. In addition, we endeavour to maintain and promote sustainability within the community while we do this.
about.2: Our mission at Enyo is to bring a bespoke, tailored aspect most commonly found in mainstream kit sponsors to the ever growing esports industry. We want to take the knowledge and experience the team has developed from working within football and rugby to elevate the esports scene. We will achieve this by collaborating closely with with partners to produce marketable products that are unique to their brand.
about.3: Founded by friends based in the East Midlands, England, Enyo is a English brand which predominantly operates from Nottingham and Leicester. However, Enyo is a global business, with clients in mainland Europe and the Americas. Our aim is to provide streamlined worldwide coverage for all the teams we take under our wing.
about.title: Made to Conquer

form.default: Get in touch with us by filling our the form below. We'll get back to you as soon as possible!
form.error: There was an issue sending your message.
form.thanks: Thanks for the message! We'll get back to you shortly.

text.1: Our passion is designing and manufacturing unique premium esports performance apparel and merchandise for esports teams, streamers and individuals.
text.2: We collaborate closely with you as a partner to produce marketable products that are unique to your brand, allowing you to diversify your revenue stream, engage with your fans and make your mark in the world of esports.

text.1: We understand the value of a strong brand voice in esports. In addition to bespoke jersey design, we will collaborate with you to produce unique, fashion-forward and marketable apparel and accessories for fans and teammembers alike.
